#!/usr/bin/python
MODULUS=8388608

def power(x,n,base):
	result=1
	while(n>0):
		if(n%2):
			result=(result*x)%base;

		x=(x*x)%base;
		n/=2;
	return result



def computeSumDirect(m):
	q1=power(2,m-1,MODULUS)
	q2=(q1*2)%MODULUS
	S1=(m+1)*q1-q2+.5

	#print "q1=",q1,"q2=",q2,"S1=",S1
	A=((m+1)*(m+1)*q1)%MODULUS-.5
	
	q3=(q1*2)%MODULUS
	q4=(q3*2)%MODULUS
	S12=(m+2)*q3-q4+.5
	B=(S12*2)%MODULUS-1
	C=(q1*2)%MODULUS-1

	#	print "A=",A,"B=",B,"C=",C
	S2=A-B+C
	return (int(S1+S2))%MODULUS
	



cases=input()

for i in xrange(cases):
	m=input()
	S=computeSumDirect(m)
	if(S<0):
		print (MODULUS+S)
	else:
		print S
